channel.title: personal-portfolio on Nasser's personal website

item.title: Portfolio pessoal
item.description: Consolidação do portfolio import pandas as pd import portman as pm pm.consolidate('trade_data.csv') Análise import matplotlib import matplotlib.pyplot as plt matplotlib.style.use('ggplot') import portman as pm pm.analysis.summary('portfolio.csv') pm.analysis.allocation('portfolio.csv') pm.analysis.returns('returns.csv') pm.analysis.dividends('dividends.csv') plt.tight_layout() Outros div = pd.read_csv('dividends.csv', parse_dates=['date_com']) print(div.groupby([div.date_com.dt.to_period('M'), 'ticker', 'type', 'date_com']).sum().tail(10)) Unnamed: 0 value vol_liq total date_com ticker type date_com 2020-12 B3SA3 DIVIDENDO 2020-12-30 67 0.41 36 14.78 JRS CAP PROPRIO 2020-12-30 68 0.
